title: H&B After Shave Balm Face Moisturizer For Men Dead Sea 150ml
features: AFTERSHAVE BALM: The aftershave for men contains a combination of Dead Sea minerals and natural plant extracts that moisturize and protect the skin. The lotion for men works to hydrate and smooth inflamed areas that are irritated by shaving. It effectively improves redness and soreness. The face moisturizer for men has a light and non-greasy formula which absorbs quickly without leaving residue.

DEAD SEA MINERALS: The men’s face lotion contains Dead Sea minerals from the Jordan valley. Dead Sea mud contains high concentrations of up to 26 different beneficial minerals such as sodium, potassium and magnesium. It has been used for centuries to alleviate dry skin conditions. The after shave balm for men nourishes the skin and provides hydration, whilst encouraging blood circulation and repair.

PLANT EXTRACTS: The shaving kit for men contains Aloe Vera which rejuvenates the skin and prevents dryness. It forms a protective barrier to lock in moisture and prevent environmental damage. The shave oil contains Vitamins A and E which are powerful antioxidants and helpful in the treatment of itchy, dehydrated skin.

SOOTHES: The men’s lotion soothes inflamed and itchy areas, shaving rash and dry skin. The advanced formula is recommended for the treatment of accumulative skin damages caused by smoking, alcohol and stress. The shaving gel for men contains UV filters which protect your skin from sun damage and prevent aging.
NATURAL INGREDIENTS: The shave gel contains natural ingredients, plant extracts and antioxidant vitamins. It’s the all-natural way to softer, smoother skin after shaving.
description: The Dead Sea is located in the Jordan valley, 1,300 feet below sea level. The Dead Sea mud contains an array of different minerals such as magnesium, calcium, sulfur, zinc, potassium, chloride and bromide. It has been found to be highly beneficial for the body and skin. Dead Sea mud has been used for centuries due to its powerful skin rejuvenating and repairing properties.
Dead Sea minerals and Aloe Vera essence work deep beneath the skin surface to nourish and hydrate. Whilst Vitamins A and E provide powerful antioxidant and conditioning benefits.
Regular use expertly hydrates, whilst bringing vital minerals and nutrients to the skin for the reduction of inflammation and redness. It’s great for shaving rash and dry skin.
Aloe Vera has powerful antiseptic properties which work to soothe itchy and flaky skin.
Improve and rejuvenate your skin using the natural properties of Dead Sea minerals and plant extracts. It’s great to add to your everyday shaving kit.
